footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Sucrose | Update Date: 08/08/2022 | Editor: SirDerpyHerp#7903

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sacrificial Fragments__
Elemental Mastery substat makes her swirls hit harder and Elemental Skill reset makes gives her more swirls.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Thirlling Tales of Dragon Slayers__
Lowers Sucrose's personal damage but buffs your one of your teammates by 48% ATK.
__Hakushin Ring__
Gives Hydro and Electro DMG Bonus to your team when Sucrose triggers Electro-Charged, ER substat also helps with getting her burst up more often.
__Magic Guide__
Elemental Mastery stat stick, makes her swirl stronger.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Astable Anemohypostatsis Creation - 6308
**2)** Elemental Burst: Forbidden Creation - Isomer Type II
**3)** Normal Attack: Wind Spirit Creation

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: It is recommended to get her to 90/90 and skip her talent levels as most of her damage come from swirls.
